labels.label:
This flow is used to load Dunkin store software data (CSV) to DB Algorithm is given below -
1. Read Individual Software Version CSV from S3 bucket. 2. Backup that file. 3. Process it according to requirement. 4. Required Validation. 5. Data Transformation & Insertion into persistent store. 5.1 Update duplicate data.

processors.name: Convert Software Data(CSV) to JSON and add Timestamp
